const Aboutme = () => { return (

How I am

I'm a passionate tech enthusiast , and creative dedicated to crafting meaningful digital experiences. Originally from Argentina, I've made the Netherlands my home. My professional journey has seen me grow both as a Front-End Developer and a Product Owner during my time at Accenture, where I thrived in a collaborative enterprise environment. My expertise extends to product management, where I'm well-versed in Agile methodologies. Crafting user stories and conducting backlog grooming are some of the key aspects of my role. In the realm of UX/UI design, I'm passionate about creating intuitive interfaces, from wire-framing to usability testing, utilizing tools like Adobe XD and Figma. Fluent in English (C1), Spanish (Native), and Italian (B1), I excel in cross-cultural communication, enriching collaborative endeavours with diverse insights. As a global citizen, I embrace diversity and thrive in environments where innovation flourishes through collaboration and inclusion.

) } export default Aboutme
